hero.title: Well Connected Independent Houses for Rent in Sector 105 Gurugram
description: Sector 105 Gurugram is a fast-developing residential locality strategically located near the Dwarka Expressway, offering smooth connectivity to Gurgaon, IGI Airport, and key business hubs of Gurugram. Tenants searching for a house for rent in Sector 105 Gurugram prefer this area because of its planned roads, growing infrastructure, and peaceful surroundings. The sector is close to essential facilities such as schools, hospitals, local markets, and daily convenience stores, making everyday life comfortable and hassle-free.

Independent houses in Sector 105 are popular among families and professionals who value privacy, spacious layouts, and a calm living environment. Compared to congested city sectors, this locality offers better space utilization and long-term rental stability. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 105 Gurugram ensures modern connectivity, comfortable living, and future growth potential in an emerging residential zone.

faqSection.description: Common tenant questions related to house for rent in Sector 105 Gurugram.

faqs.question: Is Sector 105 Gurugram a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 105 is a developing locality with good connectivity and peaceful surroundings, suitable for long-term rental living.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 105?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are available for different family sizes and budgets.

faqs.question: Is Sector 105 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area offers a calm environment with access to schools, healthcare facilities, and daily essentials.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available for rent in Sector 105?
faqs.answer: Furnished and semi-furnished houses are available depending on landlord preferences.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 105 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rental values depend on plot size, furnishings, and location, with Sector 105 offering competitive rental options.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 105?
faqs.answer: Sector 105 enjoys good connectivity via Dwarka Expressway, offering easy access to Gurgaon and Gurugram.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sector 105?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families. This depends on individual owner policies.

faqs.question: Is Sector 105 safe for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, the locality is considered safe with developing infrastructure and active residential communities.
